snippet: The Danish composer Carl Nielsen was a focal point of a concert by the New York Philharmonic, which will record his work.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert focused on works of Danish composer Carl Nielsen, performed by the New York Philharmonic, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Danish composer Carl Nielsen was a focal point of a concert by the New York Philharmonic, which will record his work.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic Plays Carl Nielsen Symphony
headline.main: Revisiting a Passion of the Past
headline.print_headline: Revisiting A Passion Of the Past
